Class BookingSession

java.lang.Object
BookingSession
public class BookingSession extends Object
This class handles the control flow of movie booking

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BookingSession(ShowTime showTime, MovieGoer movieGoer, MovieTicCal movieTicCal)
    Creates a BookingSession object with the given showtime, movie goer and movie ticket calculator

      Parameters:
      showTime - the showtime of the booking session
      movieGoer - the movie goer of the booking session
      movieTicCal - the movie ticket calculator of the booking session
